section.title: Software Requirements
section.para:
Mandatory:
Perl 5.10.0 or higher (not Perl6)
Database (MySQL 5.0+, PostgreSQL 8.4+, MSSQL 2005+ or Oracle)
Webserver
A few Perl modules (see Installation of Perl modules for details)
Optional:
On the Apache webserver, using mod_perl2 is highly recommended
LDAPv2 compliant server (e. g. OpenLDAP)
